channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Supergroup Better Lovers Announce Fall 2025 US Tour
item.description: 🎸 Ready to rock! Better Lovers hitting the road for a US tour this fall. Check out their killer lineup! 🤘 #BetterLoversTour

item.title: Fall Out Boy Crawl Out ‘From Under the Cork Tree’ to Celebrate LP’s 20th Anniversary
item.description: 🎉 Fall Out Boy fans, get ready to party like it's 2005! 🎸 Celebrating 20 years of 'From Under the Cork Tree' in style! 🌟 #FOB20 🌳

item.title: Jack Black Performs “We Got the Beat”/”Paranoid” Mashup with The Go-Go’s at Benefit Gig: Watch
item.description: 🎸 Jack Black rocks out with The Go-Go's in epic mashup performance! 🤘 #RockOn #MusicCollab

item.title: Bon Jovi Tap Bruce Springsteen, Avril Lavigne, Jason Isbell, and More for Forever (Legendary Edition)
item.description: 🎸 Legends unite! Bon Jovi collabs with Bruce Springsteen, Avril Lavigne, and more for 'Forever (Legendary Edition)' 🌟 #MusicNews #CollaborationGoals

item.title: Bright Eyes Announce EP, Share Video for New Song Featuring Hurray for the Riff Raff: Watch
item.description: 🌟 Bright Eyes is back with new music! 🎶 Check out their latest EP and video featuring Hurray for the Riff Raff! 🎥 #NewMusicAlert
